ministries.t001: Ministries • Christ the King Catholic Church
ministries.t004: There is a place for you: to serve, grow, and belong.
ministries.t005: The Fatima Apostolate Movement is a Marian movement with a mission of reparation, adoration, and consolation of the Sacred Hearts. Our main work is to pray for the sanctification of priests, vocations, the souls in purgatory, and Mary’s intentions. We carry this out through parish activities such as the Vocational Altar (a weekly home visit of Our Blessed Mother), prayer intentions shared among families, support for children in CCD to pray for seminarians, and First Friday devotions in reparation to the Sacred Heart of Jesus. We are at your service.
ministries.t020: Small community Monday 7:00 PM (after the 6:00 PM Mass)
ministries.t021: Praise Assembly Thursday 6:00 PM Adoration of the Blessed Sacrament
ministries.t022: Prayer Workshops Wednesday 7:00 PM (after the 6:00 PM Mass)

testimonies.t001: Testimonios • Christ the King Catholic Church
testimonies.t004: Real stories of faith, community, and God’s grace in our parish family.
testimonies.t009: I truly feel that this church is my home. It is a very kind community and everyone is welcome. Over the years I have grown in faith through the sacraments, prayer, and the love I have found here. Amen.
testimonies.t012: Serving in a ministry has strengthened my faith and helped my family grow closer. The support, kindness, and prayer here remind us that we are never alone—God meets us through His people.
testimonies.t015: From my first Mass, I felt welcomed. The homilies speak to everyday life, and the community has been a blessing. I’m grateful to have found a parish that feels like home.
testimonies.t018: Our children have found friends and mentors through faith formation. Seeing them learn to pray and serve has renewed our whole family’s commitment to Christ.
testimonies.t021: Music has been my prayer. Being part of the choir has helped me offer my gifts to God and feel deeply connected to the parish.
testimonies.t022: Would you like to share your testimony with our parish?
testimonies.t025: Join us for Mass, service, and community. Everyone is welcome.
testimonies.t031: © 2026 Christ the King Catholic Church. All rights reserved.
testimonies.t032: Built with Bootstrap • Images via Picsum

worship.t049: I truly feel that this church is my home. It is a very kind community and everyone is welcome. I have loved my years here, and it is wonderful to serve and learn more about Jesus Christ together. Amen.
worship.t052: Serving in a ministry has strengthened my faith and helped my family grow closer. The support, kindness, and prayer here remind us that we are never alone—God meets us through His people.
